mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTBSINFSGMT (MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARTYPE, CCAMT, CY, CCVALDATE, CCEXPDATE, MAXGUAR, CCSTATUS, REPORTFLAG) values (#{MotgaCltalBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{GuarType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CcAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CcValDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CcExpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MaxGuar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CcStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTBSINFSGMT set GUARTYPE = #{GuarType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCAMT = #{CcAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CY = #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCVALDATE = #{CcValDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCEXPDATE = #{CcExpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAXGUAR = #{MaxGuar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCSTATUS = #{CcStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{MotgaCltalBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARTYPE, CCAMT, CY, CCVALDATE, CCEXPDATE, MAXGUAR, CCSTATUS, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTBSINFSGMT where MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{MotgaCltalBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARTYPE, CCAMT, CY, CCVALDATE, CCEXPDATE, MAXGUAR, CCSTATUS, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTBSINFSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTBSINFSGMTM (MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARTYPE, CCAMT, CY, CCVALDATE, CCEXPDATE, MAXGUAR, CCSTATUS, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO, GUARTYPE, CCAMT, CY, CCVALDATE, CCEXPDATE, MAXGUAR, CCSTATUS, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTBSINFSGMT where MOTGACLTALBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{MotgaCltalBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
